title: Anaphylaxis Simulation-Based Emergency Care Training

context.additional_context: A community-based first-aid competency enhancement program for general citizens.

learning_goals: Accurately identify at least three symptoms of anaphylaxis
Perform the use of an epinephrine auto-injector (EAI) in a simulation environment with 90% accuracy
Explain step-by-step protocols for reporting to 119 and managing a patient during an anaphylactic reaction
Assess collaborative emergency response skills through team-based simulation activities
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
